title: Make It Through
description: Cassie is a shy, easy going woman who finds herself in her worst nightmare. She runs from a boyfriend who isn't the person she thought he was, is chased through the mountains and almost drowns in the freezing river. Cassie is pulled to safety and taken care of by a very gorgeous but also very dominant male. He insists she learn his ways while she stays with him until she is back to 100%. The small town police force have their hands full investigating several missing women cases but when the bodies of disfigured, tortured young women start showing up the FBI is called in. What will happen to Cassie? Will she be the next body waiting to be discovered or does she have what it takes to Make It Through?!
author: T.R. Troyer
